oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: When True Love Walks In - Arlene Harden performance
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of When True Love Walks In, written by Wayne Walker and Max Powell, produced by Frank Jones, arranged by Bill McElhiney, published by Universal Cedarwood Publishing, recorded on December 16, 1968 at Columbia Recording Studio in Nashville, TN, released by Columbia on February 25, 1969, and performed by Arlene Harden.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Arlene Harden
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Arlene Harden performs "When True Love Walks In"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Walker, Wayne, 1925-1979; Powell, Max; Jones, Frank, 1928-2005; McElhiney, Bill; Columbia Records, Inc; Harden, Arlene;
